categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lord Kherus was a male Pure-blood Sith Lord during the Cold War between the resurgent Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. As a disciple of Komok-Da, Kherus was an exceptional swordsman who fought as a member of Darth Ikoral's crew on the Red Reaper. He died defending the Sith dreadnaught in the Battle of the Red Reaper.
